TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit XamlServices extends System.Object
public ref class XamlServices abstract sealed

summary.span: 提供适用于常见 XAML 任务（读取 XAML 和写入对象图，或者读取对象图并为序列化目的而写入 XAML 文件输出）的更高级别服务（静态方法）。

span.span: Provides higher-level services (static methods) for the common XAML tasks of reading XAML and writing an object graph; or reading an object graph and writing XAML file output for serialization purposes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 模式在读取和写入方案依赖于创建的 XAML 读取器和 XAML 编写器实例的最常见 XAML 中使用的类。The modes of the class that are used in the most common XAML reading and writing scenarios rely on creating instances of XAML readers and XAML writers. 这些读取器和编写器是公共类的专用的但内部实现，如， ，和。These readers and writers are specialized but internal implementations of public classes, such as , , and . 若要使用大多数情况下，你可以依赖于默认的内部实现来获得所需的结果。To use for most scenarios, you can rely on the default internal implementations to obtain the results that you want. 对于专用化程度的方案，你可能会定义读取器和编写您自己，，并将其作为自变量的重载方法。For more specialized scenarios, you might define readers and writers yourself, and then pass them as arguments for overloads of the methods. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不建议的 XAML 读取或 XAML 编写 API 集如果正在处理 WPF 定义的类型或基于 WPF 的类型。 is not the recommended XAML reading or XAML writing API set if you are processing WPF-defined types, or types based on WPF. 有关[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]用法，使用以进行读取或加载 XAML （或 BAML）; 和为写回 XAML。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] usage, use for reading or loading XAML (or BAML); and for writing back XAML. 这些类.NET Framework XAML 服务 Api 的 XAML 读取器和 XAML 编写器在内部使用其实现;但是，它们还提供支持和专用化的 XAML 架构上下文有关特定于 WPF 的概念，如依赖项属性和已知类型的 WPF 的优化。These classes use .NET Framework XAML Services APIs and the XAML readers and XAML writers internally in their implementation; however, they also provide support and specialized XAML schema context for WPF-specific concepts, such as optimizations for dependency properties and WPF known types.

summary.span: 加载 XAML 读取器的源，并将其输出写为对象关系图。

span.span: Loads source for a XAML reader and writes its output as an object graph.

MemberSignature.Value: public static object Load (System.IO.Stream stream);
.method public static hidebysig object Load(class System.IO.Stream stream) cil managed
public: static System::Object ^ Load(System::IO::Stream ^ stream);

param.name: stream
param.span: 要作为输入加载的流。

span.span: The stream to load as input.

summary.span: 加载 XAML 读取器的 源，并将其输出写为对象关系图。

span.span: Loads a source for a XAML reader and writes its output as an object graph.

returns.span: 写为输出的对象关系图。

span.span: The object graph that is written as output.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关不同签名方法指定不同类型的源 XAML 输入。Different signatures for the method specify different types of input for the source XAML. 内部实现首先创建通过调用，然后创建一个专用的新实例，用于处理输入。The internal implementation first creates an by calling and then creates a new instance of a specialized that processes the input. 为了使调用已成功创建对象图，必须满足以下：In order for the call to successfully create an object graph, the following must be true: - 源是格式正确且有效的 XML。The source is well-formed and valid XML. - 源是有效的 XAML 语言级别。The source is valid XAML at the language level. - 在源中指定的 XAML 类型 XAML 必须解析为相关的 XAML 命名空间中的后备类型中。The XAML types that are specified in the source XAML must resolve to backing types in the relevant XAML namespaces. 例如，可以对 WPF 命名空间的 XAML 类型解析为 WPF XAML 命名空间中 XAML; 指定WPF 的程序集必须包含在项目也可以在运行时;等等。For example, XAML types for WPF namespaces can resolve to a WPF XAML namespace as specified in the XAML; the assemblies for WPF must be included in the project or available in the run time; and so on. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不是建议的 XAML 读取或 XAML 编写 API 设置如果正在处理[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]类型或类型基于[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]。 is not the recommended XAML reading or XAML writing API set if you are processing [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] types, or types based on [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. 有关[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]用法，使用以进行读取或加载 XAML; 和为写回 XAML。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] usage, use for reading or loading XAML; and for writing back XAML. 这些类使用Api 内部在其实现中; 但是，它们还提供支持的影响的 XAML 读取和写入，如的依赖项属性的优化的性质的特定于 WPF 的概念。These classes use APIs internally in their implementation; however, they also provide support for WPF-specific concepts that influence the nature of XAML reading and writing, such as optimizations for dependency properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为了返回对象图中，`textReader`输入应通过使用其相关输入构造。In order to return the object graph, the `textReader` input should be constructed by using its relevant input. 例如，它应传递的构建方式是使用有效的 XAML 作为字符串输入构造函数。For example, it should pass a that is constructed by using a valid XAML-as-string input for the constructor.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关不同签名方法指定不同类型的源 XAML 输入。Different signatures for the method specify different types of input for the source XAML. 内部实现首先创建通过调用，然后创建一个专用的新实例，用于处理输入。The internal implementation first creates an by calling and then creates a new instance of a specialized that processes the input. 为了使调用已成功创建对象图，必须满足以下：In order for the call to successfully create an object graph, the following must be true: - 源是格式正确且有效的 XML。The source is well-formed and valid XML. - 源是有效的 XAML 语言级别。The source is valid XAML at the language level. - 在源中指定的 XAML 类型 XAML 必须解析为相关的 XAML 命名空间中的后备类型中。The XAML types that are specified in the source XAML must resolve to backing types in the relevant XAML namespaces. 例如，可以对 WPF 命名空间的 XAML 类型解析为 WPF XAML 命名空间中 XAML; 指定WPF 的程序集必须包括在项目或可在运行时;等等。For example, XAML types for WPF namespaces can resolve to a WPF XAML namespace as specified in the XAML; the assemblies for WPF must be included in the project or be available in the run time; and so on.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 为了使调用已成功创建的对象树，必须满足以下：In order for the call to successfully create an object tree, the following must be true: - `xaml`输入的格式正确且有效的 XML。The `xaml` input is well-formed and valid XML. - `xaml`输入是有效的 XAML 语言级别。The `xaml` input is valid XAML at the language level. - 中指定的 XAML 类型`xaml`输入必须解析为后备类型相关的 XAML 命名空间中。The XAML types that are specified in the `xaml` input must resolve to backing types in the relevant XAML namespaces. 例如，可以为 WPF 命名空间的 XAML 类型解析为 WPF XAML 命名空间中 XAML; 指定WPF 的程序集必须包括在项目或可在运行时;等等。For example, XAML types for a WPF namespace can resolve to a WPF XAML namespace as specified in the XAML; the assemblies for WPF must be included in the project or be available in the run time; and so on. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不是建议的 XAML 读取或 XAML 编写 API 设置如果正在处理[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)]类型或类型基于[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]。 is not the recommended XAML reading or XAML writing API set if you are processing [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] types, or types based on [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]. 有关[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]用法，使用以进行读取或加载 XAML，和为写回 XAML。For [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] usage, use for reading or loading XAML, and for writing back XAML. 这些类使用Api 内部在其实现中; 但是，它们还提供支持的影响的 XAML 读取和写入，如的依赖项属性的优化的性质的特定于 WPF 的概念。These classes use APIs internally in their implementation; however, they also provide support for WPF-specific concepts that influence the nature of XAML reading and writing, such as optimizations for dependency properties.
